title: (03820) Cocentaina - 5 Plaça Venerable Escuder
description: A free (drinking) water source in the middle of a small town.

title: (03820) Cocentaina - 6 Cami de l'Estacio Nord
description: Recreational area of the Monasteri de San Cristòfol. Quite level parking, 4-5 vans fit well without disturbing the car park. Lots of picnic benches. Source. Views and beginning of the path of the Castle and Montcabrer.

title: (03820) Cocentaina - 30 Carrer del Convento
description: Public parking, open, free almost in the center, has no services or garbage

title: (03820) Cocentaina - 3 Partida Algars
description: Commercial area parking lot on the outskirts of Cocentaina. No water exchange service. Yes garbage bucket. Very good level. Carrefour shopping center 100 meters away. We had a very quiet night the weekend of the Fira de Tots Sants de Cocentaina els.

title: (03820) Cocentaina - 68 Partida Gormaig
description: Cocentaina refuge, excellent for routes in the mountains

title: (03829) Cocentaina - 32 Urbanización Nueva Llaona
description: Huge public and flat parking at N340 next to Decathlon, between Alcoy and Cocentaina. Only a 5 minutes walk from natural park Sierra Mariola.

title: (03820) Cocentaina - 1 Calle Mariana Pineda
description: Street of an abandoned urbanization 2 steps from the exit of the highway.

title: (03839) Muro d'Alcoi - 24 Camí Racó-Roca
description: Treated water for domestic use

title: (03830) Muro de Alcoy - 71 Carrer Josep Bono
title_short: (03830) Muro de Alcoy - 71 Carrer Josep Bono
description: Large parking place located next to a soccer field on the outskirts of the town, with street lamp lighting and pleasant to spend a night, without noise at night as it is not a busy street. Close to supermarket-type services and next to a playground

title: (03827) Benimarfull - 2 Camino Alfora-cabañas
description: Private plot located near the highway with paved access. Quiet place a short distance from town with place to make barbecue, paella. Gray and black water can be emptied without chemicals. Call before coming

name: Camping rural La Masia
title: (03870) Camping rural La Masia
description: Camping located in the countryside between olive trees and mountains shower toilet chemical toilet emptying. Rental of furnished safari tent. Sell organic products and handmade woodwork. Dutch owner.

title: (03839) Muro de Alcoy - 303 Carretera de Agres
title_short: (03839) Muro de Alcoy - 303 Carretera de Agres
description: Picnic area with benches and a fountain by the river. Parking where you can sleep without problems. Attention narrow access road.

title: (03804) Alcoi - 3 Carrer Jordi de Sant Jordi
title_short: (03804) Alcoi - 3 Carrer Jordi de Sant Jordi
description: Laundromat "Lavaneta". Perfect clean place for laundry. Parking in the street is difficult with a large vehicle, prefer the parking lots nearby to come on foot

title: (03804) Alcoi - 4 Avinguda Tirant lo Blanc
description: LPG at the Repsol garage.

title: (03804) Alcoi - 2 Plaça al Azraq
description: Free parking asphalt and floor space

title: (03804) Alcoi - 35 Carrer Sant Pere
description: Quiet area with beautiful views of the old town of Alcoy, in front of the Viaducto Park

title: (03839) Muro d'Alcoi - 10 Partida Turballos
description: Place on the side of the road at the entrance of the town. There is only one place, for campers or motorhomes that do not have a hitch behind. Further on in the village there is also space. Drinking water and table to eat

name: Bon Aire
title: (03810) Bon Aire
description: Beautiful location, between the mountains. We are 1 km from the village of Benilloba and 6 km from Cocentaina. In Benilloba there is a shop, a bar, a pharmacy and even a hospital. At 500 meters from us there is a waterfall, moli del salt, which is definitely worth a visit.

title: (03810) Benilloba - 78 Diseminado
description: Parking area in the entrance to Moli del Salt, day and night. In the middle of nature, very quiet. There is a picnic area and a barbecue area (ask at the Town Hall for use and availability). Nearby there is a small river and a walking path (15 min. Approx.).

title: (03819) Alcoy - 19 CV-796
description: Parking plus possibility of putting small tents uphill of the parking or towards the valley.

title: (03801) Alcoy - 8 Calle Penáguila
description: Large free parking, no services

title: (03827) Almudaina - CV-708
description: Nice view, sleep in the nature.

title: (03812) Millena - 1 Sector Polideportivo M
description: Quiet area for picnics with tables, has a fountain with drinking water, park and WC. The town is 200 m away and has a centenary elm in its square that is worth seeing.

title: (03818) Alcoi - 11 Partida Horta Major
description:
3 places on flat clay adjacent to the road
area a little noisy during the day due to hikers. Children's playground no services.

title: (03837) Agres - 117 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Little space but beautiful and you can eat super well in the restaurant right next door. From here you go up to Montcabrer.

title: (03818) Alcoi - 11 Partida Horta Major
description: Nice place to rest and give a couple of quiet walks, parking by the roadside but just traffic where it serves to get to the old people's home and facilities on both sides. play area, small botanical garden, climb to the hermitage and innable places for views.

title: (03810) Benilloba - 5 Camí Calvari
description: Parking without service and flat and paved lot. Quiet to spend a night. Access not very wide but I came back with a motorhome of 8m in reverse and came out in the same way.

title: (03840) Gaianes - 12 Avinguda l'Estació
description: It's a bus stop with a drinking water fountain next to it. Not a place to park or stay! Just fill up water bottles. Few shops and restaurants in the village. Spend a few bucks as a thank you to the town of Gaianes.

title: (46880) Urbanització Pinatell -
description: Quiet place in the middle of nature with a natural spring and good views. access by somewhat bumpy road.

title: (03837) Agres - Unnamed Road
description: The Molí Mato leisure area has toilets, showers, water, grills and picnic tables. Very shady and quiet. From there the hiking trails through the Mariola mountain range start. Enjoy it without leaving a trace.

title: (03802) Alcoi - 10 Camí Vell de Batoi
description: Ground parking without services but quiet to spend the night. Avoid entering the match schedule because the Alcoyano, which is the local football team, has a great hobby that occupies all the car parks around the stadium.

title: (46880) Urbanització Pinatell -
description: Quiet place and highly recommended! For us better than those around. The only thing to keep in mind is that being next to the road, from 8 in the morning people usually start passing by, by bike or walking (not many, but they do happen)

title: (03819) Alcoi - Carr. Font Roja
description: Only disposal, very inconspicuous directly at the sports field, not recognizable from the main street, parking is also possible, but no official parking space

title: (03818) Alcoi - 22 Carrer Els Canalons
description: Ground parking, on the outskirts of Alcoy, very quiet and at the beginning of its greenway, 10km with tunnels and bridges

title: (46880) Bocairent - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking area, 1 km along a gravel road. BBQ available. Quiet.

title: (46880) Bocairent - CV-794
description: Car park with bathroom, services and barbecue, small but very clean, non-potable water. Pleasant and perfect for spending the night, very close there is a campsite. Small parking lot but about 300 meters there is another barbecue and more parking space. Surrounded by nature.

title: (03828) Planes - 17 Carrer Metge Rodrigo
description: Quiet and wide street with parking place on both sides, without slope. Magnificent views of Planes, a very beautiful and well-preserved town. Municipal swimming pool, 3 bars. Start of hiking trails, Barranco de la Encantada, etc.

title: (03850) Beniarrés -
description: Lugar muy tranquilo enfrente del embalse de Beniarres.

title: (46880) Bocairent - 548 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Location on enclosed terrain - use GPS coordinates - fully fenced - in the middle of the protected nature reserve Sierra Mariola - paradise for nature lovers - reservations recommended - power only during sun hours (Solarsystem) - historic town of Bocairent at 12 km - center 13km

title: (03828) Planes - 1 Carrer del Sol
description: Picnic area open 24 hours, with barbecues, bathrooms and water basins. He spends the night in the street, which is very quiet because it is on the outskirts of town. A perfect place to spend the night, visit Planes and go hiking (eg ravine route of the enchanted one).

name: Camping Mariola
title: (46880) Camping Mariola
description: Camping Mariola. Camping in the middle of the natural park in winter, very calm July and August. Spectacular routes running bike etc ...

title: (03828) Planes - 24 Carrer de Ľ Ermita
description: Hermitage of Plans. Very quiet area to eat with views of the marsh of plans, swings for the little ones. Tall pines that provide enough shade. The area seems underserved. 10 minutes from the enchanted ravine

title: (03802) Alcoi - 23 Barxell
description: Restaurant parking. very quiet to sleep in step. the restaurant owner very good people, come in to say hello. they appreciate it.

title: (03850) Beniarrés - 5 CV-711
description: Parking with views of the reservoir

title: (46869) Adzaneta de Albaida - 35 Polígono N 7
description: Parking of the football stadium of the town. at night very quiet. there are also possibilities to park around. good hiking and mountain biking routes

title: (03828) Planes - 3 CV-711
description: A nice place, I have spent a very quiet night. The only thing that could be heard some little animal at night, but they have not approached. Next to the reservoir to take a bath and from here you can take an excursion to some gorges. It could go down more, but I do not recommend it since it is a flood zone. I do not think it is suitable for very large ACs since the road is a bit narrow, I with my camper have passed without problems. By the way, the driveway is a little further down.

title: (03815) Penàguila - 1 Castillo
description: Large parking lot with containers, near the town and next to the Jardin de Santos. a little steep, but very quiet

title: (03815) Penàguila - 6 Carretera Alcoleja
description: Quiet place to spend the night, we parked here with the intention of going the next day to the Aitana safari, very beautiful views !!

title: (03837) Alfafara - Unnamed Road
description: Good walking in this area, lots of trails. Best place to drive up from is the cemetery in Ontinyent, take the track that gors to the right of the cemetery, follow it all the way up and you'll see lots of potential places to stay

title: (46869) Carrícola - CV-615
description: Parking located at the exit of the Town at 5 minutes changing. Indicated with the signal P and in principle without any type of overnight restriction. We spent the night very quiet with no one. Close to the highway but with little traffic. Very nice views of the villages. It does not have any type of service. Ideal to see the town since you can't park inside. Village with several very nice excursions.

name: RabbitSong
title: (03838) RabbitSong
description:
Private stop and overnight area for caravans and motorhomes. We are located in Alfafara (Alicante), within the Serra de Mariola and 10' from Bocairent, 30' from Alcoi and barely an hour from Valencia and Alicante.

We offer good sanitary facilities and spacious plots as well as a swimming pool and all the necessary services for a comfortable and pleasant stay: water and electricity connection, black and gray water disposal, toilets and showers, WIFI, washing machine, bread service on demand. .. We are dog/pet friendly.
Rates to be agreed with the owner.

Come and enjoy a unique natural environment with your family. We are waiting for you!

It is a space without noise, in the middle of nature where at night you will enjoy a clean sky full of stars.

It is a flat terrain, with easily accessible grass cover, without limitation for the size of tents, caravans and motorhomes.

The house has outside toilets for guests. We count on your help to keep the facilities clean and make responsible use of water and electricity.

title: (03838) - 3 Lugar Diseminados
description: Parking of the Ermita de San Antonio, is not completely level but sufficient. Perfect to go visit the nearby caves. It has Barbecues. Quiet place. Tables and barbecues

title: (03811) Quatretondeta -
description:
Quiet small pitch in the middle of nature, with a breathtaking view of the 1400m high mountains. Self-sufficient supply of solar power and well water. Access to challenging hiking routes (incl. guide & routes if required). Fantastic off-road route for e-bikes through a dry river bed. The village of Quatretondeta is within walking distance, there is a restaurant and an outdoor pool in summer. The baker comes to the site every weekday and provides us with bread, sweets, empanada, pizza, eggs, milk, flour, yeast... In the neighboring field, depending on the season, there are tomatoes, peppers, aubergines, melons, courgettes, pumpkins and much more to purchase. Free WiFi, open workshop with all the tools for camper expansion/conversion/repair.
There is a small pool to cool off. Washing machine.
No possibility for waste water or chemical toilet disposal.

Waterfall: 30min
Guadelest: 30 mins
Bike shop/DIY store/Decathlon: 25 minutes
small purchase 10 min

!!! Access via CV720 (Balones) !!! no access for campers via the narrow road through Quatretondeta !!!

title: (03811) Quatretondeta - 10 Lugar Diseminados
description: Quiet place with a water source.

title: (03838) Alfafara -
description:
Small patch able to fit one motor home. 
V quiet, stunning views, right next to hike path to beautiful unique cave. 

please be respectful of locals, a few walked by and we said hola and seemed intrigued yet content to see us. 

n.b.** drinking water is a 20 minute uphill walk to natural fountain!!!

title: (46869) Benissoda - Carrer de Dalt
description: Nice secluded picnic area and at the same time close to the town, very quiet, with a couple of fountains and tables spread over two areas. Perfect for starting hiking trails, mountain biking ... Ideal for spending the night. Good access.

title: (03850) - 36 Partida Molino Plans
description: Quiet place off the main road. There is a possibility of parking for up to 3 cars. The driveway is asphalt, but it is quite narrow, so be careful if you have a wide car ? Silent Night.

title: (03850) - 10 Partida Pontet
description: Picnic area, ideal to spend day and night. we have done the night without problem, several cars and fires.

title: (03811) Cuatretondeta - CV-754
description: Excellent place to start several hiking routes in a beautiful mountain. This place is also quiet to stay for rest

title: (46844) Otos - 17 Carrer Padur
description:
AC area in Otos. Small mountain village with a small supermarket, bars, bakery, swimming pool behind the area with showers and changing rooms in summer, €3 for admission. The town has a very nice guided sundial route.
Near the Benicadell peak where you can go hiking or mountain biking.
Free emptying and filling of water at 200m.

title: (46860) Albaida - 14 Travessera Bufali
description: A wide esplanade where to park, without services but enough to visit the town. 5 minutes from the town center.

title: (03850) Beniarrés - CV-701
description: There is nothing in the right place. Perhaps it refers to the recreational area that is about 200 meters away (already in Park4Night).

title: (46860) Albaida - 32 Plaça Poligono 8
description: Parking lot next to the train station, that has been abandoned and not in use anymore

title: (03801) Alcoi - 22 Lugar Font Roja
description: Font Roja Natural Park parking. Overnight is allowed. Relatively flat site, very well kept and with a spectacular setting. There is a restaurant and a hermitage. At the weekend it gets crowded but at night there is no one.

title: (03813) Facheca - 8 CV-754
description: Parking lot in a curve with a view. Very quiet, 2 cars per hour. Suitable as a resting or sleeping place for 2 campers.

title: (03819) Alcoi - 15 Partida Llacunes
description: Masia La Safranera, private farm with rural accommodation and restaurant. Located in a privileged place, in the Parc Narutal de la Font Roja. It has a parking area for camper vans. Reserve your place

title: (03818) Alcoi - 9 Font Roja
description: The Font Roja car park, spectacular views and a picnic area, I don't know if you can spend the night, it's a very quiet area

title: (46843) El Ràfol de Salem - 166 Plaça Poligono 3
title_short: (46843) El Ràfol de Salem - 166 Plaça Poligono 3
description: Picnic area with drinking water supply, seating, very quiet, lots of shade, children's playground, overnight stay no problem, take your rubbish with you!

name: Camping Font de Sis
title: (46891) Camping Font de Sis
description: Nice place. very quiet, with showers and toilets, electricity, water and drainage. Alright.

title: (46841) - 71 Plaça Diseminado
description: It is a parking lot of an outdoor playground with a picnic area, benches and a grill. Suitable for Mercedes Sprinter, good access, very quiet

title: (46870) Alfafara - CV-6620
description: Parking next to the track. Ideal to see the sunset and the stars. Recommended in spring and autumn. 10 'by van from the famous Pou Clar in Ontinyent. Beautiful views over the town and a ravine.

title: (03813) Tollos - 7 Calle Font Vella
description: There are picnic tables

name: Camping Villa Carmen
title: (46880) Camping Villa Carmen
description: Camping Villa Carmen

title: (03813) Tollos - 15 Carrer Nou
description: Flat site that fits about 4 or 6 cars depending on length. It is at the entrance of the town. you can sleep and it is perfect for doing route 99 of the valencian generalitat. with children's park and basketball court. At the entrance there is a municipal swimming pool. We have come in March and it is closed. We have loved the town with a lot of charm and everything on an impressive slope DO NOT ENTER BY CAR almost all pedestrian.

title: (46870) Alfafara - CV-6620
description: Superb place between the trees and the nature reserve, which allowed us not to have too much wind during the night. A great place to start a hike.

title: (03813) Fageca - Camí de la Salema
description: Large, very level esplanade, access to municipal water tank and adjacent helipad, narrow driveway but very driveable. The air-conditioned town hall has tables and bins, great views of the entire Serrella. Very close to the town of Fageca, about 200 meters away, is a very good starting point for one of the most beautiful routes to the Serrella, a very quiet place. Impressive mountain route to Pla de la Casa, along the PR-CV 182. Bar in the sports center. Nice town to walk around.

title: (46880) Bocairente - 23 Avenida San Blas
description: Facing the cemetery, beautiful view of the village, easy access, flat terrain, departure for beautiful walks

title: (46880) Bocairent - 13 Carrer Pallisetes
description: Very good location, overlooking the town. quiet place to sleep.

title: (46880) Bocairent - 16 Calle San Jaime
description: Parking to spend the night, quiet despite waking up a rooster. The town very nice and especially the caves.

title: (46880) Bocairente - 1 Calle de la Vía
description: Parking next to the restaurant but not restaurant owned it seems to me. Various cars park here. One big seat next to an antique wagon. Other standard, passenger seats. Small motorhomes of the VW Caravelle type will fit. Next to it there is a playground and a water tap, in the park.

title: (46880) - 456 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Perfect to sleep. Very calm. Let's not take out chairs and tables. Wonderful Natural Park discretion. If we respect we will be respected ..

title: (03860) L'Orxa -
description: We have spent the night here and it is a sea of tranquility, it is next to the old train station that is in ruins and the Via Verde del Serpis route also begins here, there is no water or toilet but if you can take a dip later on the Weir of Hell.

title: (03860) L'Orxa - 3 Partida Devesa
description:
New parking area next to the old paper mill (chulisima, although now in ruins) and under the Perputxent Castle. There are parts that are level and others more inclined, although there is a level place around the buildings and at the foot of the chimney.
Without Services.
It sleeps in luxury and with good views.
Excellent overnight site for the BTT route of the greenway of the Serpis river.
Bikes can be hired at the hostel.

title: (46842) Rugat - 54 Plaça Gral Diseminados
description:
Picnic area in the middle of nature.
There is no drinking water, but you sleep very peacefully.
10 minutes away there is a raft to bathe.

title: (03788) - 37 Lugar Diseminados
description: The Font de la Mata de Benisilim. Point where the Route of the 8 Villages ends (you can do it the other way around, of course). Picnic area, two wooden tables with benches. There is an old fountain, but it looks like it hasn't worked for years. There is a garbage can. Very secluded and quiet place. Good shade for the summer.

title: (46880) Bocairent - 2B Carrer de Joaquim Sorolla
description: Upper part of the city, quiet area with beautiful views. It is very close to the old town, walking around is highly recommended. Fairly well leveled but with much better shims. It is accessed from the back of the city, on the other side there are narrow streets.

title: (03819) Alcoi - 1 Partida Polop Alt
description: Parking of the Polop Alt hermitage, on land and surrounded by trees, between the Sierra de Mariola and Font Roja natural parks. There are no services but it is quiet and with good views of the surroundings. Good area for hiking.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 267 Plaça Numero 14
description: Parking of the Onteniente cemetery free parking there is also a dirt side street where you go to the beginning of several hiking trails, apparently there is no provision to park you can not camp and pet dogs With Leash

title: (03860) L'Orxa - 30 Carrer del Castell
description: There is one site located in L'orxa (Lorcha) on P4N. I prefer to stay where someone else might be usually, so went in search of another location. I came to L'orxa as it has a BTT cycle route centre and plenty of nearby routes for cycling, mountain biking and hiking here, sign posted, printed and online using apps like Wikiloc and Backcountry Navigator. I visited L'Auberge Del Serpis to enquire about routes and had a beer there. Nice guys catering for people stopping over on cycle routes. You can top up water there if you ask nicely and a shower with a towel. Parking is flat, but it is in a dried up river bed used as passage for a few cars, so if its dry, it's good. There are a few bars in the village and they also serve some local dishes. If you want to go cycling or walking, then I suspect you will like it here.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 57 Plaça Numero 19
description: This is an area we used to park our 6M van to visit the Por Clau waterfall, you just need to walk along the main road for two minutes. We parked here from 11:30-16:15 on a Wednesday.

title: (03440) Ibi - Camí de Sant Pasqual
description: Flat area, of land parking near the hermitage of San Pascual

title: (46890) Agullent - 34 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Two spots along a dirt track between the olives. Nice view, just a little bit of noise from the motorway. No shade, no services

title: (46870) Ontinyent - CV-81
description: Excellent place to spend the night. very calm.

title: (46880) - 633 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Inside the Enguídanos Forest Park. Clear between pines and holm oaks, next to a refuge.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 1 Avinguda del Torrater
description: At the exit of the town. Quiet area to sleep on weekends.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 10 Plaça Vicent Andrés Estellés
description: Parking without services, open field, next to picnic tables

title: (46842) Rugat - 14 Carrer Jaume I
description: A very nice quiet place to stay. Access only suitable for van. Barbecue area and children's playground.

name: Camping Natura
title: (46842) Camping Natura
description: Camping Natura - Rugat family camping. Close to various hiking spots.

title: (46870) Onteniente - 2R Calle d'Esteve Urgelles
description: Parking area next to a large playground, perfect for dogs and children.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 7 Avinguda d'Albaida
description: Self-service laundry. 3 washers and 2 dryers washing machine price according to capacity

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 7 Avinguda de la Generalitat
description: Quiet parking, day and night. A little steep, but fine. We have spent the night and no problem. From here we have gone to see El pou clar. A very beautiful place. 9 minutes by car and 30 minutes on foot.

title: (03517) Confrides - 58 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Font de l'arbre recreational area, at the foot of l'Aitana, a good place to start hiking trails, mountain biking, canyoning ... There are tables and a barbecue, a good place to spend the night. The track to get from the port of tudons is about 4 km and is in quite good condition, no problem to get there.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 14T Carrer de Manuel Taberner Gandia
title_short: (46870) Ontinyent - 14T Carrer de Manuel Taberner Gandia
description: Huge open field with areas of grass and others of earth. They hardly park cars or trucks so you are almost always alone and you have a choice. It is going down a ramp. Very quiet and peaceful, practically only people go to walk the dogs. Nearby services: Mercadona 2 min. walking, pharmacy 2 min., self-service laundry 5 min., El Teller shopping center 10 min.

title: (46892) Montaverner - CV-60
description: Rest place gas station nice bar reataurant simple and locally spacious places

title: (46892) Montaverner - 2 Avinguda Sant Pancraci
description: Car Park, but quiet and safe for overnight motorhome parking.

title: (46870) Onteniente - 21 Polígono Número 16
description: University parking lot, asphalted part and part of land, some tree, quite level and very quiet. To spend a night or just park. Mercadona next door. Well located

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 227 Plaça Numero 16
description: Flat grass or small gravel ground near sports facilities

title: (03100) Jijona - Carretera de Xixona
description: Parking at the top of the pass at 1020 meters altitude. Beautiful view of the Sierra. Quiet night. Possibility of many walks and hikes in the surrounding forests. You will find other places a little further to park there.

title: (03813) Famorca - CV 720
description: Fuente dels Noguers (in Famorca -less than 100 inhabitants-, a town on Route 99). Resting forest place. There is a fountain with a small stream (today; at other times, with less drought, it must give more water, I guess), a couple of tables with benches and trees; cobbled ground and around earth. The space for vans and ACs is more or less flat with capacity for about 7/10 vehicles; on one side, with a tree, for two. About 30/40 m from the road where hardly anyone passes.

title: (03788) Alcalà de la Jovada - 25 Diseminado Diseminados
title_short: (03788) Alcalà de la Jovada - 25 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Public parking. Fairly level and wide. No services. Recycling containers. Starting point for hiking. Nearby there is a children's play area, swimming pool and restaurants.

title: (03860) Lorcha - Les Fontetes
description: Very quiet area with place for two campers. Good views of the river.

title: (03517) Confrides - 32 Diseminado Diseminados, CV-70
description: Parking with picnic area and natural and cool fountain. Free parking

title: (46840) - 440 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Recreational area about 2km. from the village with barbecue and tables. At the top there is a parking space for small vans, but below there is a large terrace to park. Nice views of Benicadell and the Bellús reservoir

title: (03788) Patro - 2 Calle Joan Fuster-alpatro
description: New motorhome area with all services. Beautiful town, with a bar and spectacular views. Well-known and very beautiful family routes. Highly recommended the route of the eight towns

title: (46893) Alfarrasí - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet area near the river

title: (03787) Patró - 2 Calle Carretera
description: Alpatró Along a wide street outside town, on one side there are cherry trees. Only 2/3 sites, nice, quiet and safe place. No services. Ideal for visiting the Vall de Gallinera and going on an excursion to the 8 villages. Car pass first thing in the morning.

title: (03787) Patro - CV-700
description: Fountain next to the road. There is a small parking lot. Water can be loaded for a need.

title: (03440) Ibi - 18 Avinguda del Cementeri
description: Parking of the cemetery, between pine trees, very quiet, secluded with some soft and warm lighting, with shade, a very quiet night without noise or disturbances, further down there is a fenced dog park to be able to release them, although it may give a bit of trouble Because it is a cemetery, it is a very quiet place to rest, in the morning there was only the van of the man who opens the cemetery and no problem staying overnight.

title: (03440) Ibi - 44 Partida Fernova
description: Parking next to the old laundry. With beautiful views of the town. There are no services. In the background there are trees that provide shade. Entrance not suitable for very large vehicles.

title: (03440) Ibi - 12 Avenida Joaquín Vilanova
description: Quiet Caññe to spend the night and visit the old town.

title: (03440) Ibi - 3A Passeig dels Geladors
description:
Reopening of the old area
without services
very good quiet
Thanks to the community

name: B&B Casa Mil Sueños
title: (46870) B&B Casa Mil Sueños
description: Discover the beauty of the Spanish interior with a stay at our atmospheric small-scale camping spot! Enjoy a relaxing getaway in this perfect location and transit route. Due to the limited number of places, calling in advance, whatsapp is recommended. With only a few camper pitches, our camping spot offers a quiet and intimate atmosphere that you won't find on larger campsites. Book now and experience the magic of camping in Spain's Tuscany.

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 18 CV-795
description: Surrounded by nature on the road from Banyeres to Alcoy. information Center. a large natural car park with trees and many spaces, flat area. Without services

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 617 Calle la Marjal
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 617 Calle la Marjal
description: Full land at the back of the sports park. Almost flat along a small path that passes.

title: (03440) Ibi - 9 Passeig dels Geladors
description: Off road parking. Short walk into town to visit the toy museum and life size toys next to the tourist information. Close by park for night parking is closed off so we found this spot.

title: (03440) Ibi - 15 Calle Pablo Sorozábal
description: Parking next to a large park, there are bars nearby. In the park there are games for the little ones and a dog park, with water for the dogs. In September it is not active because they are parties and put on the fair.

title: (03440) Ibi - 15 Carrer Francesc Tarrega
description: Quiet parking, you can start a hiking trail or mountain bike. There is a hermitage to visit, from above you can see a panoramic view of Ibi.

name: Benissuera
title: (46839) Benissuera
description: Benissuera has a motorhome parking area with a Punt Net, a service area where gray and black water can be drained and drinking water can also be replenished. It also offers electricity connection by payment with tokens. Next to the area there are “paelleros”, with picnic tables. It is located next to the municipality and has interesting paths for walking or cycling next to the reservoir.

title: (46880) Bocairent - 340 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Large parking lot to rest, asphalt road if you enter through the entrance that comes from Bocairent.

title: (46850) L'Olleria - 139 Plaça Diseminados Res
description: Location in the countryside - with a view of the mountains - owners speak Spanish, German, English and Russian

title: (03788) Alicante - 78 Partida la Carroja
description: Place of land with trees between the pool and the indoor soccer field. Vall views

name: Camping Finca les Coves
title: (03100) Camping Finca les Coves
description: Campsite on glamping Finca Les Coves, owned by a young Dutch couple. Amazing area near the town Xixona. Electricity, toilet and shower available. Public area with salt-water pool and bar. contact for availability.

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 22 Carrer de la Font Bona
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 22 Carrer de la Font Bona
description: Perfect esplanade for parking. Very close to the tourist office. There they perfectly explain the points of interest and they even have great guided tours to visit the most interesting parts of the town.

title: (03517) Benifato - 17 CV-70
description: Stunning view over Guadalest reservoir in large parking lot. we stopped for lunch but you could park for the night. flat and a relatively quiet road

title: (46842) Terrateig - 261 Plaça Numero 1
description: Pretty picnic area near a hermitage and the CV 60. Pleasant stopover with picnic tables.

title: (46839) Guadasequies - 30 Calle Esperanza
description: Parking area near public park for children, only parking, no other services, within the town, very quiet

title: (03517) Benifato - CV-70
description: An area next to the road where there is a flat clearing where to park. I have slept there and it is not a very busy road, although you can hear the cars passing by. very natural site

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 792 Partida Campo Oro
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 792 Partida Campo Oro
description: Moulin de l'Ombria. Camping and picnic area where you can spend the day but night prohibited. In spring and summer it is possible to use barbecues, toilets and other facilities free of charge.

title: (03517) - 27 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking spot by the side of a quiet road near the resevoir (road goes circular around resevoir), stream running beside it. Very peaceful. Space for 2 motorhomes. Nice views of surrounding villages and hills

title: (46850) - 627 Plaça Diseminados Res
description: Good for a meal break. Along a small country road. Facing the fields. A motorhome can come.

title: (46812) Aielo de Malferit - 4 Avinguda Jaume I
title_short: (46812) Aielo de Malferit - 4 Avinguda Jaume I
description: At the end of the street, just after the college and the pool, very quiet and quiet

title: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 898 Paratge Partida el Bovar
title_short: (03450) Banyeres de Mariola - 898 Paratge Partida el Bovar
description: Recreational area where you can spend the day, have a picnic, there are tables, a river to bathe etc ...

title: (03517) - 40 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Placed in the middle of nature, especially for hiking and spending a night in the light of the stars. A very quiet area and no parking problems, all surrounded by almond trees and a water fountain.

title: (46850) L'Olleria - 367 Plaça Poligono 5
description: Gravel spot, also normal parking lot nearaby. Close to school, quiet during weekends. Nice place, close to the city to spend a night.

title: (03579) - 56 Partida Tagarina
description: About 4 dirt roads, sometimes rocky, sometimes stony. Once you are up there you have a magnificent view. Problematic without 4x4. Strongly depends on the condition of the path. At the moment it is driven out and washed out by the rain. Routing with Google cannot be trusted!

title: (03450) Bañeres - 776 Partida Campo Oro
description: Quiet on the outskirts, flat, several camping pitches with a view of meadows and the national park. Trail entry.

title: (46850) L'Olleria - 42 Avinguda de la Diputacio Provincial
title_short: (46850) L'Olleria - 42 Avinguda de la Diputacio Provincial
description: Quiet parking without services next to two supermarkets and a playground. It is good to stop to buy or even to spend the night.

title: (46838) Benicolet - CV-610
description: Very quiet recreational area. It has paelleros and a traditional washing machine as well as a source of non-potable water.

title: (03787) Beniaia - 1A Carrer Carretera
description: Free parking at the entrance of the town of Beniali. The parking lot is quite flat and quiet, the spaces are for medium-sized camper vans. It has containers. Perfect for the route of the Foradà and the route of the 8 villages.

title: (03517) Beniardá - 12 CV-757
description: Public parking lot, very quiet.

title: (03578) Relleu - 4 Partida Castell
description: Public parking with picnic area, barbecues, municipal outdoor swimming pools, pool bar with bathrooms in the picnic area, a drinking water source and a camping area for shops. Everything very clean and taken care of. It is a very quiet place and the local people are very friendly, nice and respectful. Next to it are the ruins of a castle that light up at night.

title: (03517) Beniardá - 1 Lugar Embalse
description: Nice flat place with shade and closef to river. not for big campers. Ok for example VW T4 california

title: (46850) Ollería - 10 Calle Proyecto Número 3
description:
NEW motorhome area in L'Olleria that replaces the previous one.
It consists of 4 parking spaces in an urban, quiet, flat and level area
Water filling service, emptying of gray and black water.
Beautiful excursions in the mountains
Close to bars, restaurants and supermarkets, bakery and laundry.
You can visit the town with a glass museum.
Thanks to the town hall for this service.

title: (46850) L'Olleria - 10 Calle Proyecto Número 3
description:
NEW motorhome area in L'Olleria that replaces the previous one.
It consists of 4 parking spaces in an urban, quiet, flat and level area
Water filling service, emptying of gray and black water.
Beautiful excursions in the mountains
Close to bars, restaurants and supermarkets, bakery and laundry.
You can visit the town with a glass museum.
Thanks to the town hall for this service.

title: (03793) Castell de Castells - CV-720
description: Parque del Bancal Blanc recreational area. It has picnic areas, water and playground. Very quiet at night despite the proximity to the road. On the side in the city there is a wide and flat parking lot also with restaurants.

title: (03579) Sella -
description: Super park up in mountain near Sella. On the route for three signposted walks.

title: (03579) Sella - 27 Avinguda d'Alcoi
description: Water point in the middle of the town of Sella. Need for an adapter and the possibility of filling the water tank since there is just a bus stop.

title: (46726) Llocnou de Sant Jeroni -
description: The place is perfect to spend the night, very quiet, there a lot of shade

title: (03793) Castell de Castells - Unnamed Road
description: Castellet camping area. Very quiet area, beautiful but only for cars and campers due to the narrow access road.

title: (03516) Benimantell - 25 Calle Crehueta
description: Small esplanade with beautiful views of the mountains and the Guadalest reservoir. Cozy little place, we had a very quiet night.

title: (03793) Castell de Castells - 8 Camino 7
description: Flat, dirtground parking by the little road leading to the recreation-area. Lots of nature around and still close to the village. We were told by the GD that it was okey and free to stand here and spend two good nights. Just a few hikers passing by, and some drive up to park up the road. No facilities at the parking but it's about 150m to the recreation-area where you have bins, toilet and showers (but only open surtan hours) and picnic tables. It's also free to stay there but you need to registrate to the GD or online. See info via googlemaps.

title: (46839) Bellús - C. Petra Julve
description:
Visit the natural site of l'Estret de les Aigües and the cave paintings of the Cova de la Petxina. The Palau de Bellvis, included in the inventory of the Architectural Heritage of historical-artistic interest and the Hermitage of the Holy Christ of the Good Death.
From A-7 take exit 11 (Gandia / L'Olleria) and follow CV-60 towards N-340 / Gandia / L'Olleria. Take N-340 towards Alfarrasí. Before reaching Bellús, turn right towards CV-612 (Benigànim / Quatretonda). At 750 m turn left towards Av. Balneario and follow the signs to the municipal swimming pool.
Fee will be paid at the Town Hall
YOU MUST GO TO THE CITY COUNCIL TO DEPOSIT THE AMOUNT

title: (03579) - 2 Partida Solana
description: Public parking of sella. Next to the town. Without services In the town there is a fountain. It is not particularly beautiful but asphalted and flat. There are 3 parking terraces. The one on top has more views but it is not that flat. Near climbing areas.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 10 Plaça Numero 21
description: Hermitage of Morera (Ontinyent). Quiet place to spend the night in contact with the rural environment. 7 km from the Natural Park of Pou Clar. Near the towns of Ontinyent and Fontanars dels Alforins.

title: (03517) - 28 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Zona para aparcar y acampar al lado del embalse. Es fácil acceder y bañarse. Es el parking para hacer kayak pero nosotras acampamos un domingo y estábamos solas. Hay una mesa de picnic también. No es muy grande pero caben varios coches.

title: (03516) Benimantell - 2 Carrer Barranquet
description: Fenced parking at the entrance of the village, next to the road but very quiet. Traffic can be heard during the day, not at night. Quiet to spend the night. There are very good views of the mountains and the town. I guess food services can be found in town.

title: (46830) Benigànim - 5 Avinguda l'Ortisa
description: Lavenderia Econet Vall Blanca laundromat.

title: (03516) Benimantell - 1 Partida Crehueta
description: Small area where you can park the AC with wonderful views and close to the tourist attraction of Guadalest Castle, just 250 meters away, where you can find public toilets. the only drawback is the slightly uneven terrain.

title: (46839) Bellús - 5 Calle San Gregorio
description: Public water dispenser

title: (46839) Bellús - 7 Calle de la Ermita
description: Public water dispenser

title: (03579) Sella - 18 Partida Alcantara
description: Picnic area next to the Alcantara Fountain, ideal for filling your water jugs and taking a bath.

title: (03517) Guadalest - 2 Calle Calvario
description: Quiet place very close to the town overlooking the reservoir of Guadalest, asphalting suitable for motor homes and children

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 12 Plaça Numero 4
description: Hermitage of San Esteve

title: (03579) Sella -
description: Accessible place with nice view. Great picnic area, also for an overnight stay. Max 2 (bus) campers.

title: (03517) El Castell de Guadalest - 3 Lugar Diseminados
title_short: (03517) El Castell de Guadalest - 3 Lugar Diseminados
description: Small parking bay on the edge of the road, opposite a restaurant that says it's parking is private, but as this is on the other side of the road it is fine. We stayed here for a few hours while we visited the town and the castle, it is a 10 minute walk into town along the road but without a footpath, fine for us. May be suitable for 5 vans lengthwise.

title: (46839) Bellús -
description: In the middle of nature near an inaccessible stream... Quiet night without passage, several places possible, a few mosquitoes...

title: (03430) Alicante - 7 Plaça 7
description: Recreation area near the village of Onil, with toilets and public water source. Tables and benches for eating, as well as a barbecue.

title: (03517) El Castell de Guadalest - CV-755
description: Small parking on the sand. Next to the road. Very quiet.

name: Refugio de Guadalest
title: (03517) Refugio de Guadalest
description:
Camping area for vehicles and tents. It is located next to the climbing area, the owners are a very familiar couple, the man is one of the team members in the area. Ideal for enjoying the tranquility of nature. They make very copious Mediterranean breakfasts, excellent meals (you have to warn in advance, because the products are always fresh). They have a bathroom inside the house with a hot shower, they have a heater and if you need anything you can ask them. They accept pets (they don't discriminate by size and are very affectionate). With children, they are very attentive and friendly. You can bring food and they have space to cook with your own accessories, however drinks from outside are NOT allowed. They have a wood burning stove in the dining room. It is a very comfortable and familiar place.

Attention, not accessible for motorhomes over 3.5 t, not wide road, very steep last climb. To get there, turn left towards the butcher's shop.

title: (03517) El Castell de Guadalest - 1 Calle la Era
title_short: (03517) El Castell de Guadalest - 1 Calle la Era
description: Parking spaces right next to the deposit for approximately 10 vichos. 2 minute walk to the swim point entrance for the reservoir. During the day, many people passed by on mountain bikes, walking dogs, etc. along the paths that surrounded it, but very quiet. Completely quiet at night. No parking restrictions, dumpsters on site

title: (46720) Villalonga - Partida Tarraso, 346
description:
I can offer a great pitch for one van (maximum length 6m) on my private property.
The pitch is at the top of my quiet and secluded garden. It has an amazing view of La Safor mountain range, and down the valley towards the town of Villalonga.

I live at the end of the valley, surrounded by orange groves, avocado trees and passion fruits. 
Plenty of opportunities for cycling, hiking, river swimming, climbing. Beaches are approximately 20 minutes drive away and are the best in Spain!
Nearby Villalonga is an ordinary working town, not touristy. Facilities include a large supermarket, banks, post office, shops, garage, bars and restaurants.

The pitch is accessed via a private road, it is narrow and steep, 3.5m wide at its narrowest and 4.3m maximum width. 
There is no opportunity to deposit rubbish, there are bins down the valley. Also no facilities for disposing of either grey or black water. 
The pitch is not completely level, but with levellers it is just fine. 
There is electricity and access to clean drinking water at the site.

Cash payments only please. 
Please phone/WhatsApp me in advance or email for more information.
I look forward to meeting you.
Best wishes 
Lynne Morton

title: (46839) Bellús - 135 Plaça Numero 3
description: Quiet place by the river. Space for one or two vans. Not for big RV, IMO max. lenght 6m.

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 42 Partida Llacuna
description: Area surrounded by nature, in the urbanization la llacuna. Quiet place without cover. Picnic tables. Large fountain. The barbecues are no longer usable.

title: (46650) Canals - 291 Partida del Tunel
description: Quiet place to spend the night with picnic areas, shade, and views of Canals. Start zone of route on foot.

title: (03516) Benimantell - 1 Partida Collao Blanch
description: Land next to a wall to climb called cajon para los cuartos, super quiet. highly recommended for climbers. can be accessed easily with autocarabana

title: (46839) Bellús - 1 Plaça Numero 3
description: In a place with a lot of history, prehistory, a river, climbing spots, at the end of a small path accessible by van or small camper. Superb. No facility, no water, no electricity ...

title: (03517) El Castell de Guadalest - 5 Lugar Diseminados
title_short: (03517) El Castell de Guadalest - 5 Lugar Diseminados
description: It is a private parking that travelers let rest, in front of the sausage factory with views of the Antea mountain going down to the reservoir

title: (03100) Xixona - CV-7840
description: A small, sandy parking space off the beaten track, next to a cami that leads to the spectacular "El Salt", a hidden natural lake with a waterfall in the mountains. Although near the main road, the place is calm and peaceful.

title: (03516) Benimantell -
description: Picnic area on the CV-70 road. Quiet night, flat ground, place for several vehicles. Below it is possible to admire the view in the valley, very nice.

title: (03100) Xixona - 53 Carrer d'Alcoi
description: Public parking at the entrance to Xixona, a wide dirt floor without prohibitions. Supermarket in front, good to explore the city, children's park nearby. Crossing the quiet bridge at night

title: (03516) Benimantell -
description: Great space for short cars (max 6 m I would say) for hiking and also for a night. Very quiet just before a good paved road turns into a dirt road.

title: (03100) Xixona - 11 Carrer Santa Creu
description: Parking without services. calm. level.

title: (03420) Castalla - 1000 Lugar I Pd 3
description: Large car park attached to a busy road during the day. It is paved.

title: (46894) Genovés - 47E Diseminado Poligono 8
description: Magnificent place to spend a few days surrounded by nature. A river passes a few meters from the ideal parking to go with children and family

title: (03789) La Vall d'Ebo - 126 Lugar Diseminados
description: Ebo valley laundry. quiet area next to the track, with drinking water and flat pk area

title: (03100) Xixona - 26 Carrer Francesc Nicolau Mira Miralles
title_short: (03100) Xixona - 26 Carrer Francesc Nicolau Mira Miralles

title: (03793) Castell de Castells - 12 Partida Ayalt
description: Close to Elsa arcs, spectacular natural arches, area surrounded by nature, 360 ° view, very quiet night.

title: (03791) Castell de Castells - Carrer de l'Àguila
title_short: (03791) Castell de Castells - Carrer de l'Àguila
description: Did not find the spot next door. Therefore here stony dirt road in the curve, then small area for a minivan. View into the valley & rest. No surprise: no service.

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 4 Carrer Cais
description: Parking for public use, located in the center of the town. City Hall, bars, public fountains and monuments a few meters away.

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 25 Carrer Santa Teresa
